1: I wait patiently and am heard with kindness.
2: I stand on solid ground and walk with steady steps
3: A new song of praise inspires many to trust the divine.
4: Those who trust the greater good honor humility and truth, flourish.
5: Wonderful works and caring thoughts toward us overflow beyond measure
6: Attentive listening leads to wholehearted willing action.
7: I come to accomplish my purpose as written.
8: I joyfully do what is right from the heart
9: I openly proclaim righteousness to the whole community
10: I publicly declare faithfulness, salvation, love, and truth to everyone.
11: Loving kindness and truth continually preserve me.
12: I lift my gaze and keep a steadfast heart.
13: I receive timely help and swift deliverance.
14: Progress continues as peace and honor surround the journey.
15: Respectful speech brings honor and enduring peace.
16: Seek wholeheartedly, rejoice constantly, and celebrate saving help.
17: Attentive care brings help and deliverance.
